languages.text: "Я провалил миссию. Подвел всех". {n}Соломон стискивает зубы до скрежета.{/n} "Врагов было слишком много, обстоятельства давили... Нет, я не ищу оправданий. Это не первый раз, когда на задании возникают осложнения, но со мной не было Глейто. Я был небрежен, расфокусирован. Слишком поздно скомандовал отступление".

"I failed the mission. Failed everyone." {n}Solomorne clenches his teeth.{/n} "There were too many enemies. The situation was against us... No, I am not making excuses. It was not my first mission to go awry, but I didn't have Glaito with me. I was sloppy, unfocused. I ordered the retreat too late."
languages.original_text: "Я провалил миссию. Подвел всех". {n}Соломон стискивает зубы до скрежета.{/n} "Врагов было слишком много, обстоятельства давили... Нет, я не ищу оправданий. Это не первый раз, когда на задании возникают осложнения, но со мной не было Глейто. Я был небрежен, расфокусирован. Слишком поздно скомандовал отступление".

traits.locale_text: "I failed the mission. Failed everyone." {n}Solomorne grinds his teeth.{/n} "There were too many enemies, and the circumstances were against us... No, I am not looking for excuses. It was not my first mission to go awry, but I didn't have Glaito with me. I was sloppy, unfocused. I ordered the retreat too late."

"I failed the mission. Failed everyone." {n}Solomorne grinds his teeth.{/n} "There were too many enemies, and the circumstances were against us... No, I am not looking for excuses. It was not my first mission to go awry, but I didn't have Glaito with me. I was sloppy, unfocused. I ordered the retreat too late."

It was not my first mission to go awry, but I didn't have Glaito with me. I was sloppy, unfocused. I ordered the retreat too late."

It was not my first mission to go awry, but I didn't have Glaito with me. I was sloppy, unfocused. I ordered the retreat too late."

"I failed the mission. Failed everyone." {n}Solomorne clenches his teeth.{/n} "There were too many enemies. The situation was against us... No, I am not making excuses. It was not my first mission to go awry, but I didn't have Glaito with me. I was sloppy, unfocused. I ordered the retreat too late."

"I failed the mission. Failed everyone." {n}Solomorne clenches his teeth.{/n} "There were too many enemies. The situation was against us... No, I am not making excuses. It was not my first mission to go awry, but I didn't have Glaito with me. I was sloppy, unfocused. I ordered the retreat too late."

languages.text: 「俺は任務を失敗した。みんなを失敗させちまった」{n}ソロモーンは歯を食いしばった。{/n}「敵が多すぎたんだ。その上、状況は不利だった…いえ、言い訳をしてるわけじゃない。こういう任務が失敗するのは初めてじゃなかったけど、グライトが一緒じゃなかったんだ。雑だったし、集中力を欠いてた。撤退命令を出すのが遅すぎたんだ」
languages.original_text: "I failed the mission. Failed everyone." {n}Solomorne clenches his teeth.{/n} "There were too many enemies. The situation was against us... No, I am not making excuses. It was not my first mission to go awry, but I didn't have Glaito with me. I was sloppy, unfocused. I ordered the retreat too late."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は任務を失敗した。みんなを失敗させちまった」{n}ソロモーンは歯を食いしばった。{/n}「敵が多すぎたんだ。その上、状況は不利だった…いえ、言い訳をしてるわけじゃない。こういう任務が失敗するのは初めてじゃなかったけど、グライトが一緒じゃなかったんだ。雑だったし、集中力を欠いてた。撤退命令を出すのが遅すぎたんだ」

languages.text: "Ich habe die Mission im Stich gelassen. Ich habe alle im Stich gelassen." {n}Solomorne beißt die Zähne aufeinander.{/n} "Es waren zu viele Feinde. Die Situation war gegen uns ... Nein, das sind keine Ausreden. Es war nicht meine erste gescheiterte Mission, aber ich hatte Glaito nicht dabei. Ich war schlampig, unkonzentriert. Ich habe zu spät den Rückzug angeordnet."
languages.original_text: "I failed the mission. Failed everyone." {n}Solomorne clenches his teeth.{/n} "There were too many enemies. The situation was against us... No, I am not making excuses. It was not my first mission to go awry, but I didn't have Glaito with me. I was sloppy, unfocused. I ordered the retreat too late."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe die Mission im Stich gelassen. Ich habe alle im Stich gelassen." {n}Solomorne beißt die Zähne aufeinander.{/n} "Es waren zu viele Feinde. Die Situation war gegen uns ... Nein, das sind keine Ausreden. Es war nicht meine erste gescheiterte Mission, aber ich hatte Glaito nicht dabei. Ich war schlampig, unkonzentriert. Ich habe zu spät den Rückzug angeordnet."

languages.text: « J'ai échoué à accomplir ma mission. J'ai échoué à protéger mes hommes, {n}siffle Solomorne entre ses dents.{/n} Nos adversaires étaient trop nombreux. Les circonstances étaient contre nous... Non. Je n'ai pas d'excuses. Ce n'est pas la première fois que l'une de mes missions tournait mal, mais Glaito n'était pas là pour me soutenir. J'ai été négligent, j'ai manqué de concentration. J'ai trop tardé à ordonner la retraite. »
languages.original_text: "I failed the mission. Failed everyone." {n}Solomorne clenches his teeth.{/n} "There were too many enemies. The situation was against us... No, I am not making excuses. It was not my first mission to go awry, but I didn't have Glaito with me. I was sloppy, unfocused. I ordered the retreat too late."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai échoué à accomplir ma mission. J'ai échoué à protéger mes hommes, {n}siffle Solomorne entre ses dents.{/n} Nos adversaires étaient trop nombreux. Les circonstances étaient contre nous... Non. Je n'ai pas d'excuses. Ce n'est pas la première fois que l'une de mes missions tournait mal, mais Glaito n'était pas là pour me soutenir. J'ai été négligent, j'ai manqué de concentration. J'ai trop tardé à ordonner la retraite. »

languages.text: «Fracasé en mi misión. Les fallé a todos». {n}Solomorne aprieta los dientes.{/n} «Había demasiados enemigos. Teníamos la situación en nuestra contra... No, no se trata de un pretexto. No era la primera misión que se torcía, pero Glaito no estaba conmigo. Fui descuidado, negligente. Tardé demasiado en ordenar la retirada».
languages.original_text: "I failed the mission. Failed everyone." {n}Solomorne clenches his teeth.{/n} "There were too many enemies. The situation was against us... No, I am not making excuses. It was not my first mission to go awry, but I didn't have Glaito with me. I was sloppy, unfocused. I ordered the retreat too late."

traits.locale_text: «Fracasé en mi misión. Les fallé a todos». {n}Solomorne aprieta los dientes.{/n} «Había demasiados enemigos. Teníamos la situación en nuestra contra... No, no se trata de un pretexto. No era la primera misión que se torcía, pero Glaito no estaba conmigo. Fui descuidado, negligente. Tardé demasiado en ordenar la retirada».

languages.text: “是我失败了，我让所有人失望了。”{n}索罗蒙咬紧了牙。{/n}“敌人太多了，形势对我们不利……不，我这并不是在找借口。这并不是第一次作战行动出了岔子，但格雷托这次却不在我身边。是我大意了，我疏忽了敌人的动向，等我下令撤退的时候，已经太迟了。”
languages.original_text: "I failed the mission. Failed everyone." {n}Solomorne clenches his teeth.{/n} "There were too many enemies. The situation was against us... No, I am not making excuses. It was not my first mission to go awry, but I didn't have Glaito with me. I was sloppy, unfocused. I ordered the retreat too late."

traits.locale_text: “是我失败了，我让所有人失望了。”{n}索罗蒙咬紧了牙。{/n}“敌人太多了，形势对我们不利……不，我这并不是在找借口。这并不是第一次作战行动出了岔子，但格雷托这次却不在我身边。是我大意了，我疏忽了敌人的动向，等我下令撤退的时候，已经太迟了。”

languages.text: "Görevimde başarısız oldum. Herkesi hayal kırıklığına uğrattım." {n}Solomorne dişlerini sıkıyor.{/n} "Düşman çok kalabalıktı. Şartlar bizden yana değildi... Hayır, bahane üretmiyorum. Bu, işlerin ters gittiği ilk görevim değildi ancak bu sefer Glaito yanımda değildi. Özensizdim, odaklanmamıştım. Geri çekilme emrini çok geç verdim."
languages.original_text: "I failed the mission. Failed everyone." {n}Solomorne clenches his teeth.{/n} "There were too many enemies. The situation was against us... No, I am not making excuses. It was not my first mission to go awry, but I didn't have Glaito with me. I was sloppy, unfocused. I ordered the retreat too late."

traits.locale_text: "Görevimde başarısız oldum. Herkesi hayal kırıklığına uğrattım." {n}Solomorne dişlerini sıkar.{/n} "Düşman çok kalabalıktı. Şartlar bizden yana değildi... Hayır, bahane üretmiyorum. Bu, işlerin ters gittiği ilk görevim değildi ancak bu sefer Glaito yanımda değildi. Özensizdim, odaklanmamıştım. Geri çekilme evrini çok geç verdim."
